title: Taliyah speaks 2 quotes at the same time
body:
Title says it all. Taliyah speaks multiple quotes at one time.

I am not exactly sure what triggers it, but something like using a q in your worked ground or q'ing in general just doesn't make her shut up and it is so annoying lmao.

replies.body:
Heya! 
Thanks for the report! We've got a few sound designers on the case, and this should be fixed soon. :3

{{champion:112}} AHhahHAHhaHAHahHAHhaHAHhaHAHahHAhhAHAhahHAhaHAhaHAHhaHAH 
like why can't champions just stfu
